title: environment modules appear to be broken
body:
It looks like environment modules got broken during the recent change of directory structure.

```
$ spack reindex
$ spack module refresh
==> Regenerating tcl module files.
==> Regenerating dotkit module files.
$ source $SPACK_ROOT/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-7.3.0-apple/environment-modules-3.2.10-3x6j4dfglk6b733oaxcctrjnr5zji5j5/Modules/init/bash
$ echo $SPACK_ROOT
/Users/davydden/spack
$ . $SPACK_ROOT/share/spack/setup-env.sh
$ module avail

---------------------------------------------------------- /Users/davydden/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-7.3.0-apple/environment-modules-3.2.10-3x6j4dfglk6b733oaxcctrjnr5zji5j5/Modules/modulefiles -----------------------------------------------------------
dot         module-git  module-info modules     null        use.own

---------------------------------------------------------- /Users/davydden/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-7.3.0-apple/environment-modules-3.2.10-3x6j4dfglk6b733oaxcctrjnr5zji5j5/Modules/modulefiles -----------------------------------------------------------
dot         module-git  module-info modules     null        use.own
$ spack load dealii
ModuleCmd_Load.c(208):ERROR:105: Unable to locate a modulefile for 'dealii-dev-clang-7.3.0-apple-5prgyt5y7ie2qr2ydmyfphkwcp7bnqfb'
```

A colleague of mine who started a fresh Spack yesterday had the same problem.
